title: How to take interest in Analog Electronics - Quora

response.answer_text: See if you are really interested in analog electronics, then the best way is to do it practically. Buy the necessary equipment for making electronics like bread board, analog ICs, capacitors, resistors, some tools and many more and try to make something that can benefit you. For example, if your friends are always busy on their cell phones, (which has now become a disease and sorry if your are addicted too), and you don’t like it, make a phone jammer. It will not alow anybody to use their phone. Or if you have habit of locking your room and listening to songs on your head phones, make a door knock sensor so that you can see whenever someone knocks the door. Doing all this will not only build your interest in electronics but also will make your life simpler and then progressing in it will certainly make you one of the best electronics hobbyist.

I have a different take on this. Buy some data books from companies like National Semiconductor and if you can lay your hands on any application books. These data books will generally contain all technical data on each IC and will also have some typical applications. Just scan these books and go for something that piques your interest. You may want to read up and study some basic electronics and how discrete devices behave.

Digital is only two levels Zero and One. It is a step. But there analog is the slope between the two. It is wide area. First understand the basic components, R, L and C. Never ignore these three. Then sources DC and AC voltage and current. It's actions wit RLC. Then generation, motors and transformers. Even if your interest is electronics learn the basics of Electricals. About conductors, insulators etc. Then Power supplies, opamps. Whenever there is a down come to components and power sources. Read old history of electricity as a story reader. Will be very useful. Work practically with power supplies to start.

You can take interest in Analog Electronics by having good knowledge of Digital Electronics. It will help you understand the drawbacks of Digital Electronics and why after everything being managed digitally there is a need of Analog electronics. There are field of study where digital electronics can only take you to a particular level of precision. Take an example of Acoustics or Imaging where knowledge of Analogue Electronics allows you to make elegant solutions. Any Digital circuit always follows rules of analog electronics.

make an FM transmitter. You can actually learn a tonne of stuff when you actually make things. Your persistance to make it work will teach you better and incite the interest to find out more so you can make more practical things that you would like to.
Best way is watch animated videos on you tube related to Analog Electronics. Another way is find a funny but talented teacher or friend who is good in this field. Books will not help you :( .

You are either interested in something or you aren’t. If you aren’t, don’t give it a try. If you aren’t sure, then do give it a try. But don’t do something because you think you should if the interest isn’t there.
In all Electronics you will play with the motion of Electrons. In analog the challenges you faces while doing experiment will/ can create interest in you.
